name: ZTAB

screenshots.caption: ZTAB : generate online playable HTML adventure games
ZTAB : Visualize and edit huge projects

short_description:
Software for creating very easily Text adventure games :

* Build text adventure games and gamebooks
* Text, image and sound based aventure games.
* Simple graphical game edition (no script)
* Design as you play: you play, and if you want to enhance, you add new text and conditions and you continue to play. Nothing simpliest !
* As you design, ZTAB points out your errors.
* Import/export : HTML, RTF, PDF, EPUB, Advelh, Twine, Quest, Ren'Py
* Confidentiality mode

Download editor : https://sourceforge.net/projects/ztab/files/ZTAB%20Editor/
Download player :
https://sourceforge.net/projects/ztab/files/ZTAB%20Runner/
Download game example :
https://sourceforge.net/projects/ztab/files/ZTAB%20Example/

ZTAB of https://sourceforge.net/projects/ztab/ is provided regarding the terms of the licence Creative Commons Attribution – No commercial use - No modification 3.0 France. (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/3.0/fr/
summary: Ze Text Adventure game Builder : Create as you play !
